column1: Friends will be received from 3 to 5 and 7 to 9 p.m. Monday in the LEO M. BACHA FUNERAL HOME INC.
column3: Greensburg. A funeral service will begin at 1 p.m. Tuesday in the funeral home with the Rev. David Clement officiating. Interment will follow in Mt. Lebanon Cemetery
column5: with full military honors accorded by the American Legion Post 981 Honor Guard. The Irwin LOOM Lodge 236 will conduct a service at 7 p.m. Monday in the funeral home.
